description: This is a great item to have for any Nexus Tablet owner. The case has a removable semi rigid keyboard. The keyboard can easily be connected to an Nexus Tablet by Bluetooth. The case also has a sturdy stand on the back to help the Nexus Tablet from falling back when pressing on the screen. Many similar items do not have a sturdy support for the Nexus Tablet which results in the Nexus Tablet easily falling down if pressing on the screen. The clasp to keep the case closed does not use a magnet, so it will not interfere with your Nexus Tablet. The Snap On case has the benefit of not interfering with the Nexus Tablet's automatic light sensor. We also include a screen protector so that your Nexus Tablet will be completely protected
title: Ionic Tablet stand Leather for (2012) Amazon kindle Fire HD 7 keyboard case bluetooth (Black/Brown)
